author: adrianc
msg: Small fix for UtilObject. The getByteCount(Object obj) method was returning unusual results for non-serializable objects. I also added an explanatory note in the JavaDoc.
An interesting article on getting the size of Java objects - http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/javaqa/2003-12/02-qa-1226-sizeof.html?page=1.
